column3: Concept ACK, but the [documentation for `-whitelist`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/228c319a944b0ba7c835b1909ee1c2056c652eb1/src/init.cpp#L418-L419) would need to be updated updated as well?
What is the difference with  #10051 by @rubensayshi?\nAnyhow, at least @gmaxwell didn't think it was a good idea there, should probably keep the discussion in one place...
Closing, this has been inactive for too long.
